messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Arressst both beusss, beat them, one of them ssstole the jet pack

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Space-time anomalies detected on the station. There is no additional data.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Meteor Alert

Meteors have been detected on collision course with the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to space being cold, a pack of mice have swarmed into the maintenance areas.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Bring sssauce to the REAL captain, Tul-ullisss

wanted.author: Nanotrasen Officer #842
wanted.description: Orange hair, 24 years old, wears a hat, wanted for loitering
